name: A Rising Bond
description:
"War demands sacrifice of the people. It only gives suffering in return.”

- Frederic Clemson Howe

From this idea “A Rising Bond” is born, a narrative driven game in third person with adventure, survival and stealth elements. Set in an mid century eastern european country devasted by war, Alex, a 19-year-old must survive.

During his journey he will meet Erika, a girl he must protect and care for, and who will also help him in her own way. The game aims to show the rawness of war from the perspective of a survivor at a disadvantage against the world, and the relationship formed between the two characters.

Play the demo with PS4 Controller or Keyboard and Mouse!
